code: @Test public void testRecipientListInvalidEndpointErrorHandler() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(0).     getMockEndpoint("mock:dead").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             onException(Exception.class).handled(true).to("mock:dead").             from("direct:start").recipientList(constant("fail:endpoint")).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
